Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.

In case of an emergency on the road, the truck can stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, the truck can take emergency avoidance measures, turn on the turn signal and change lanes quickly to avoid after observing the rear-vehicles.

At the same time, the drivers should keep calm, control the vehicle, and slow down with quick braking. Do not step on the brakes.
43/005589 1 0 45,[vehicles drive too fast with short braking distance,resulting in that car hits car[Vehicles should not exceed the speed limit during driving, especially in areas with many pedestrians.Vehicles should slow down when passing intersections or crosswalks, and observe the traffic carefully.
8/006131 1 0 75,[The truck does not notice other vehicles when reversing,resulting in that ego-car hits a truck[Before backing up the truck, the drivers should observe the surrounding environment, take turns to scan the three rear-view mirrors, put your foot on the brake, and brake in time if necessary. Other vehicles should stay away from the vehicle when the truck backing up, passing or stopping in time, and sound the horn when necessary.
38/006320 1 0 56,[Motorcycle does not notice the other vehicles when turning or changing lanes,resulting in that motorbike hits motorbike[When changing lanes or turning, the motorcycle should observe the coming vehicles carefully, and turn on the turn signal in advance when changing lanes; The driver of the vehicle should increase the following distance, so that the motorcycle has enough time to react when turning or changing lanes.

Other vehicles should stay away from the vehicle when the truck backing up, passing or stopping in time, and sound the horn when necessary.
8/007942 1 0 86,[The truck evades other vehicles, pedestrians or objects and changes lanes emergently,resulting in that ego-car hits a truck[The truck should keep a safe distance from the front vehicle for emergency braking. In case of an emergency on the road, the truck can stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, the truck can take emergency avoidance measures, turn on the turn signal and change lanes quickly to avoid after observing the rear-vehicles.
56/005608 1 0 72,[Pedestrian does not notice the coming vehicles when crossing the street.,resulting in that car hits pedestrian[When passing the zebra crossing, drivers must slow down. When pedestrians or non-motor vehicles cross the zebra crossing, they should stop and give way to other normal running vehicles; When crossing the road, pedestrians must follow the zebra crossing, carefully observe the traffic, and do not cross the road in a hurry.
11/006652 1 0 74,[Ego-car is rear ended by the rear car,resulting in that ego-car hits a car[Ego-cars should try to avoid changing lanes at will, so as not to affect the normal traffic of the rear vehicles. They should always look at the rearview mirror and pay attention to the distance to the rear vehicles. For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.

Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.

At the same time, vehicle drivers should keep calm, control the vehicle, and slow down with quick braking. Do not step on the brakes.

For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.

10/006610 1 0 110,[vehicles do not give way to normal driving vehicles when turning or changing lanes,resulting in that ego-car hits a crossing car[Before turning or changing lanes, vehicles should turn on the turn signal in advance, observe the surrounding vehicles and control the speed. When driving, vehicles should abide by traffic rules, and give the way for the normal running vehicles. Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.
11/008396 1 0 82,[The vehicle in front of ego-car decelerates or stops suddenly,resulting in that ego-car hits a car[When the ego-car driver encounters a sudden deceleration or stop of the front vehicle, he should quickly decelerate, observe the road conditions, place his foot above the brake pedal, be ready to step on the brake at any time, and leave a sufficient safety distance from the front vehicle.

14/010505 1 0 150,[Ego-car evades other vehicles, pedestrians or objects and changes lanes emergently,resulting in that ego-car hits a curb[The safety distances between the ego-car and the front vehicle should be sufficient for emergency braking. In case of an emergency on the road, the ego-car should stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, collision avoidance can be taken. Ego-car should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles, and change lanes quickly.

For rear end vehicles, when the brake light of the front vehicle lights up, you should brake synchronously, reduce the speed to the same frequency as the speed of the vehicle in front, and always keep a safe distance from the vehicle in front.

Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.

Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.

Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.

14/010101 1 0 100,[Ego-car evades other vehicles, pedestrians or objects and changes lanes emergently,resulting in that ego-car hits a curb[The safety distances between the ego-car and the front vehicle should be sufficient for emergency braking. In case of an emergency on the road, the ego-car should stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, collision avoidance can be taken. Ego-car should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles, and change lanes quickly.

43/013424 1 0 48,[vehicles do not give way to normal driving vehicles when turning or changing lanes,resulting in that car hits car[Before turning or changing lanes, vehicles should turn on the turn signal in advance, observe the surrounding vehicles and control the speed. When driving, vehicles should abide by traffic rules, and give the way for the normal running vehicles. Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.

When the red light is on, he/she shall brake in time. When he/she encounters a zebra crossing or stop line during driving, he/she must pay attention to the traffic lights.

11/013387 1 0 32,[Ego-car is rear ended by the rear car,resulting in that ego-car hits a car[Ego-cars should try to avoid changing lanes at will, so as not to affect the normal traffic of the rear vehicles. They should always look at the rearview mirror and pay attention to the distance to the rear vehicles. For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.

37/005504 1 0 69,[The motorcycle tire is locked due to emergency braking,resulting in that motorbike falls down[The driver should practice emergency braking in more times. First release the accelerator, straighten the body, brake first, then brake, and then brake in front. Cooperate with the engine to brake. Don't stop for a moment. Let the wheels rotate slightly. When driving at high speed, you must not pinch the clutch.

Ego-car should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles, and change lanes quickly.

At the same time, vehicle drivers should keep calm, control the vehicle, and slow down with quick braking. Do not step on the brakes.

For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.

The vehicles should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles and change lanes quickly.

Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.

11/005256 1 0 67,[The vehicle in front of ego-car decelerates or stops suddenly,resulting in that ego-car hits a car[When the ego-car driver encounters a sudden deceleration or stop of the front vehicle, he should quickly decelerate, observe the road conditions, place his foot above the brake pedal, be ready to step on the brake at any time, and leave a sufficient safety distance from the front vehicle.

11/010416 1 0 135,[vehicles do not give way to normal driving vehicles when turning or changing lanes,resulting in that ego-car hits a car[Before turning or changing lanes, vehicles should turn on the turn signal in advance, observe the surrounding vehicles and control the speed. When driving, vehicles should abide by traffic rules, and give the way for the normal running vehicles. Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.
11/011753 1 0 160,[Ego-car is rear ended by the rear car,resulting in that ego-car hits a car[Ego-cars should try to avoid changing lanes at will, so as not to affect the normal traffic of the rear vehicles. They should always look at the rearview mirror and pay attention to the distance to the rear vehicles. For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.

14/013561 1 0 37,[Ego-car evades other vehicles, pedestrians or objects and changes lanes emergently,resulting in that ego-car hits a curb[The safety distances between the ego-car and the front vehicle should be sufficient for emergency braking. In case of an emergency on the road, the ego-car should stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, collision avoidance can be taken. Ego-car should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles, and change lanes quickly.

Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.

In case of an emergency on the road, the ego-car should stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, collision avoidance can be taken. Ego-car should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles, and change lanes quickly.

37/007678 1 0 51,[The motorcycle tire is locked due to emergency braking,resulting in that motorbike falls down[The driver should practice emergency braking in more times. First release the accelerator, straighten the body, brake first, then brake, and then brake in front. Cooperate with the engine to brake. Don't stop for a moment. Let the wheels rotate slightly. When driving at high speed, you must not pinch the clutch.

Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.

24/003113 1 0 60,[The vehicle evades other vehicles, pedestrians or objects and changes lanes emergently,resulting in that car hits a curb[The safety distance between the vehicle and the front vehicle should be sufficient for emergency braking. In case of an emergency on the road, the vehicles should stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, collision avoidance can be taken. The vehicles should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles and change lanes quickly.
11/005121 1 0 43,[Ego-car is rear ended by the rear car,resulting in that ego-car hits a car[Ego-cars should try to avoid changing lanes at will, so as not to affect the normal traffic of the rear vehicles. They should always look at the rearview mirror and pay attention to the distance to the rear vehicles. For rear vehicles, when the braking light of the front vehicle lights up, they should brake synchronously, slow down, and keep a safe distance to the front vehicle.
11/001425 1 0 42,[Ego-car does not give the way at narrow road,resulting in that ego-car hits a car[Ego-cars should give way at the obstacle road section, narrow mountain road and other places, park at a place with enough width to meet, let the other party pass first, pay attention to the left and right rear-view mirrors, and try to ensure that their right wheels are on the right side of the road.
11/009263 1 0 102,[vehicles do not give way to normal driving vehicles when turning or changing lanes,resulting in that ego-car hits a car[Before turning or changing lanes, vehicles should turn on the turn signal in advance, observe the surrounding vehicles and control the speed. When driving, vehicles should abide by traffic rules, and give the way for the normal running vehicles. Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.

When driving in rainy days, the road surface is wet and slippery, and the friction resistance becomes smaller. Vehicles should control the speed, and the braking operation of them should be as soft as possible to avoid anti lock falling.

43/004042 1 0 40,[The vehicle evades other vehicles, pedestrians or objects and changes lanes emergently,resulting in that car hits car[The safety distance between the vehicle and the front vehicle should be sufficient for emergency braking. In case of an emergency on the road, the vehicles should stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, collision avoidance can be taken. The vehicles should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles and change lanes quickly.

Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.

Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.

When driving, vehicles should abide by traffic rules, and give the way for the normal running vehicles. Vehicles that will enter the main road should give way to the vehicles which drive on the main road or leave the main road. Vehicles that drive on the auxiliary road should give way to the vehicles which drive off the main road.
21/007635 1 0 62,[vehicles are out of control,resulting in that car hits large roadblocks[Vehicles should not drive too fast in bad weather and severe road types, such as rainy, snowy, nightyime, or in poor locations, and mountain areas and curves. At the same time, vehicle drivers should keep calm, control the vehicle, and slow down with quick braking. Do not step on the brakes.
14/013623 1 0 43,[Ego-car evades other vehicles, pedestrians or objects and changes lanes emergently,resulting in that ego-car hits a curb[The safety distances between the ego-car and the front vehicle should be sufficient for emergency braking. In case of an emergency on the road, the ego-car should stop in the lane and try not to change lanes in an emergency. If the braking distance is not enough, collision avoidance can be taken. Ego-car should turn on the turn signal and observe the rear vehicles, and change lanes quickly.
10/001738 1 0 33,[The ego-car's vision is blocked or blurred, and there is no time to brake,resulting in that ego-car hits a crossing car[Ego-cars should slow down or honk their horns when they stop at intersections or trunk roads where their vision is blocked to prevent other vehicles or pedestrians from rushing out suddenly.
41/003609 1 0 50,[truck tires fall off when driving,resulting in that truck has failure of components[Before driving, the truck driver should visually check whether the bolts and nuts of the wheels are complete, rusty, cracked or damaged. When driving, if the tires fall off, the truck driver should hold the steering wheel tightly, slow down after observing the rear vehicle through the rearview mirror, and turn on the hazard warning flash.

Other vehicles should stay away from the vehicle when the truck backing up, passing or stopping in time, and sound the horn when necessary.
